title: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars II - Kakeru x Joji x Minato
title_japanese: KING OF PRISM -Shiny Seven Stars- II カケルxジョージxミナト
synopsis: The second movie in the four-part King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars movie series.

Prequel.name: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars I - Prologue x Yukinojou x Taiga

Sequel.name: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars III - Leo x Yuu x Alexander

Alternative version.name: King of Prism: Shiny Seven Stars

opening_themes: "Shiny Seven Stars!" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima), Yukinojou Tachibana (Souma Saitou), Taiga Kougami (Tasuku Hatanaka), Kakeru Juuouin (Taku Yashiro), Minato Takahashi (Masashi Igarashi), Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka), Yuu Suzuno (Yuuma Uchida)
ending_themes: "366 LOVE Diary (366LOVEダイアリー)" by Shin Ichijou (Junta Terashima), Yukinojou Tachibana (Souma Saitou), Taiga Kougami (Tasuku Hatanaka), Kakeru Juuouin (Taku Yashiro), Minato Takahashi (Masashi Igarashi), Leo Saionji (Takuma Nagatsuka), Yuu Suzun
